quote: The negative side of the American Dream comes when people pursue success at any cost, which in turn destroys the vision and the dream.
author: Azar Nafisi

quote: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.
author: Tommy Hilfiger

quote: Successful people are not gifted; they just work hard, then succeed on purpose.
author: G. K. Nielson

quote: Success is only meaningful and enjoyable if it feels like your own.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: I am not bound to win, but i am bound to be true. I am not bound to succeed, but i am bound to live up to what light i have.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Ben Sweetland

quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
author: Confucius

quote: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
author: Jane D. Hull

quote: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent.
author: Shahrukh Khan

quote: If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Strategy is a style of thinking, a conscious and deliberate process, an intensive implementation system, the science of insuring future success.
author: Pete Johnson

quote: No one who achieves success does so without acknowledging the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Reading more books will only confuse you more and you will be dreaming about success instead of becoming successful yourself.
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
author: Pele

quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Prosperity makes friends, adversity tries them.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. Hard work is the price we must pay for success. I think you can accomplish anything if you're willing to pay the price.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: That man is a success who has lived well, laughed often and loved much.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I feel that the most important requirement in success is learning to overcome failure. You must learn to tolerate it, but never accept it.
author: Reggie Jackson

quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Success is relative: It is what we can make of the mess we have made of things.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: There is no success without hardship.
author: Sophocles

quote: To climb steep hills requires slow pace at first.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Success is the sweetest revenge.
author: Vanessa Williams

quote: Nothing succeeds like success.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: Luxury is the wolf at the door and its fangs are the vanities and conceits germinated by success. When an artist learns this, he knows where the danger is.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: You are a product of your environment. So choose the environment that will best develop you toward your objective. Analyze your life in terms of its environment. Are the things around you helping you toward success - or are they holding you back?
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Donâ€™t read success stories, you will only get a message. Read failure stories, you will get some ideas to get success
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Success is the sum of details.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: If a man has been his mother's undisputed darling he retains throughout life the triumphant feeling, the confidence in success, which not seldom brings actual success along with it.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Success is usually the culmination of controlling failure.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: Success without honor is an unseasoned dish; it will satisfy your hunger, but it won't taste good.
author: Joe Paterno

quote: Rest satisfied with doing well, and leave others to talk of you as they please.
author: Pythagoras

quote: Even on the most exalted throne in the world we are only sitting on our own bottom.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: When you see something that is technically sweet, you go ahead and do it and you argue about what to do about it only after you have had your technical success. That is the way it was with the atomic bomb.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: The two leading recipes for success are building a better mousetrap and finding a bigger loophole.
author: Edgar Shoaff

quote: Success is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you're in control of your life. If you don't, life controls you.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Four things for success: work and pray, think and believe.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.
author: Sam Ewing

quote: I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Success is achieving your goals and objectives with happiness love and glory
author: Nabil Basma

quote: The winner's edge is not in a gifted birth, a high IQ, or in talent. The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude. Attitude is the criterion for success.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: My literary success meant nothing to me.
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: Every person who wins in any undertaking must be willing to cut all sources of retreat. Only by doing so can one be sure of maintaining that state of mind known as a burning desire to win - essential to success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: There is no royal road to anything. One thing at a time, all things in succession. That which grows fast, withers as rapidly. That which grows slowly, endures.
author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Personal relationships are the fertile soil from which all advancement, all success, all achievement in real life grows.
author: Ben Stein

quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You will soon break the bow if you keep it always stretched.
author: Phaedrus

quote: When a man does all he can, though it succeeds not well, blame not him that did it.
author: George Washington

quote: Only a mediocre person is always at his best.
author: Somerset Maugham

quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The superior man makes the difficulty to be overcome his first interest; success comes only later.
author: Confucius

quote: When it gets difficult is often right before you succeed.
author: Chris Garrett

quote: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The secret to success is to offend the greatest number of people.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Success certainly isnt achievement of popularity. Success in Gods kingdom is loving God loving one another and being faithful to what Hes called us to do.
author: Gabriel Wilson

quote: To succeed, jump as quickly at opportunities as you do at conclusions.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success occurs when opportunity meets preparation.
author: Zig ziglar

quote: You never achieve success unless you like what you are doing.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Make service your first priority, not success and success will follow.
author: Source Unknown

quote: For every force, there is a counter force. For every negative there is a positive. For every action there is a reaction. For every cause there is an effect.
author: Grace Speare

quote: Success isn't permanent and failure isn't fatal.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: Because memory is time folding back on itself. To remember is to disengage from the present. In order to reach any kind of success in automobile racing a driver must never remember.
author: Garth Stein

quote: Success comes from taking the initiative and following up... persisting... eloquently expressing the depth of your love. What simple action could you take today to produce a new momentum toward success in your life?
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe.
author: Sumner Redstone

quote: Success is the child of audacity.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: To laugh often and much: To win the respect of intelligent people and the affection of children, to earn the appreciation of honest critics and endure the betrayal of false friends; to appreciate beauty, to find the best in others, to leave the world a bit better whether by a healthy child, a garden patch, or a redeemed social condition; to know even one life has breathed easier because you lived. This is to have succeeded.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: In hindsight, I slid into arrogance based upon past success.
author: Reed Hastings

quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: I planned my success. I knew it was going to happen.
author: Erykah Badu

quote: Keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.
author: Roger Babson

quote: Think twice before you speak, because your words and influence will plant the seed of either success or failure in the mind of another.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: No student ever attains very eminent success by simply doing what is required of him: it is the amount and excellence of what is over and above the required, that determines the greatness of ultimate distinction.
author: Charles Kendall Adams

quote: If you want to be truly successful invest in yourself to get the knowledge you need to find your unique factor. When you find it and focus on it and persevere your success will blossom.
author: Sydney Madwed

quote: Forward, as occasion offers. Never look round to see whether any shall note it... Be satisfied with success in even the smallest matter, and think that even such a result is no trifle.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The secret of success is sincerity.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: Success didn't spoil me, I've always been insufferable.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: ...If there is no risk there is no reward.
author: Christy Raedeke

quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
author: Henry Ford

quote: There is no force like success, and that is why the individual makes all effort to surround himself throughout life with the evidence of it; as of the individual, so should it be of the nation.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
author: Shahrukh Khan

quote: There's no abiding success without commitment.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Nobody travels on the road to success without a puncture or two.
author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: A person with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When prosperity comes, do not use all of it.
author: Confucius

quote: My literary success meant nothing to me.
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: Nobody travels on the road to success without a puncture or two.
author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: A person with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When prosperity comes, do not use all of it.
author: Confucius

quote: My literary success meant nothing to me.
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: Every person who wins in any undertaking must be willing to cut all sources of retreat. Only by doing so can one be sure of maintaining that state of mind known as a burning desire to win - essential to success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: There is no royal road to anything. One thing at a time, all things in succession. That which grows fast, withers as rapidly. That which grows slowly, endures.
author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Personal relationships are the fertile soil from which all advancement, all success, all achievement in real life grows.
author: Ben Stein

quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You will soon break the bow if you keep it always stretched.
author: Phaedrus

quote: When a man does all he can, though it succeeds not well, blame not him that did it.
author: George Washington

quote: Only a mediocre person is always at his best.
author: Somerset Maugham

quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The superior man makes the difficulty to be overcome his first interest; success comes only later.
author: Confucius

quote: When it gets difficult is often right before you succeed.
author: Chris Garrett

quote: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The secret to success is to offend the greatest number of people.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Success certainly isnt achievement of popularity. Success in Gods kingdom is loving God loving one another and being faithful to what Hes called us to do.
author: Gabriel Wilson

quote: To succeed, jump as quickly at opportunities as you do at conclusions.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success occurs when opportunity meets preparation.
author: Zig ziglar

quote: You never achieve success unless you like what you are doing.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Make service your first priority, not success and success will follow.
author: Source Unknown

quote: For every force, there is a counter force. For every negative there is a positive. For every action there is a reaction. For every cause there is an effect.
author: Grace Speare

quote: Success isn't permanent and failure isn't fatal.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: Because memory is time folding back on itself. To remember is to disengage from the present. In order to reach any kind of success in automobile racing a driver must never remember.
author: Garth Stein

quote: Success comes from taking the initiative and following up... persisting... eloquently expressing the depth of your love. What simple action could you take today to produce a new momentum toward success in your life?
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe.
author: Sumner Redstone

quote: Success is the child of audacity.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: To laugh often and much: To win the respect of intelligent people and the affection of children, to earn the appreciation of honest critics and endure the betrayal of false friends; to appreciate beauty, to find the best in others, to leave the world a bit better whether by a healthy child, a garden patch, or a redeemed social condition; to know even one life has breathed easier because you lived. This is to have succeeded.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: In hindsight, I slid into arrogance based upon past success.
author: Reed Hastings

quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: I planned my success. I knew it was going to happen.
author: Erykah Badu

quote: Keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.
author: Roger Babson

quote: Think twice before you speak, because your words and influence will plant the seed of either success or failure in the mind of another.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: No student ever attains very eminent success by simply doing what is required of him: it is the amount and excellence of what is over and above the required, that determines the greatness of ultimate distinction.
author: Charles Kendall Adams

quote: If you want to be truly successful invest in yourself to get the knowledge you need to find your unique factor. When you find it and focus on it and persevere your success will blossom.
author: Sydney Madwed

quote: Forward, as occasion offers. Never look round to see whether any shall note it... Be satisfied with success in even the smallest matter, and think that even such a result is no trifle.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The secret of success is sincerity.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: Success didn't spoil me, I've always been insufferable.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: ...If there is no risk there is no reward.
author: Christy Raedeke

quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
author: Henry Ford

quote: There is no force like success, and that is why the individual makes all effort to surround himself throughout life with the evidence of it; as of the individual, so should it be of the nation.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
author: Shahrukh Khan

quote: There's no abiding success without commitment.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Nobody travels on the road to success without a puncture or two.
author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: A person with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When prosperity comes, do not use all of it.
author: Confucius
